summary: I OWN A 1999 PONTIAC GRAND AM. I HAVE A COOLANT LEAK AND HAVE BEEN TOLD THAT IT IS FROM AN INTAKE GASKET. I HAVE RESEARCHED THIS AND THE PROBLEM SEEMS TO BE AS COMMON AS A HOUSE PLANT. WHY HAS GM NOT BEEN FORCED INTO A RECALL? OR BETTER YET, WHY HAS GM NOT DONE THE RIGHT THING AND ISSUED A RECALL?*JB
